This detailed two-day course walks you through the six steps needed to create a valuable model; from defining your research question to creating the model and model validation. With the use of two case studies, we will teach you how to execute a machine learning task step-by-step, providing you with the appropriate code.

issuer.summary: issued by GAIn® - The Global AI network

Structuring a modeling project – Create business impact and having sufficient knowledge about each step to have an overview.
Roles within the modeling process – Distinguish what the role of the analyst is versus the business stakeholder.

9e134d9a-2cbc-48b5-accd-b7776d49a369.description: There are many analysis techniques available but knowing which one to apply in which situation requires a good analysis plan. This training takes you step-by-step from creating a hypothesis to selecting the right explorative analysis technique, before heading towards the data and conducting the analysis. The analyses covered include decile, profile, source of difference, and migration analysis.
9e134d9a-2cbc-48b5-accd-b7776d49a369.name: 3204 - Explorative Analysis Techniques - 2020

issuer.summary: issued by GAIn® - The Global AI network

Creating analytical insights – Understanding which technique to use when testing hypotheses from a hypothesis tree.
Source of difference analysis – Being able to perform a source of difference to evaluate the differences between two moments in time.
Decile analysis – Being able to perform a decile analysis to find the most (or least) valuable groups in the base.
Profile analysis – Being able to perform a profile analysis to gain insight into the profile of individuals/products in a focus group.
Exam

f62ca02c-1c47-4d12-900e-902f22777d04.description: Automating your data pipeline ensures its speed and quality. This two-day module will teach you how to design a data pipeline that you can apply to all work which involves processing data. We will cover everything from the basics of creating automatable data pipelines, to orchestrating scripts and monitoring an automated data pipeline. You will learn the management of data pipelines including the why, when, and how of making code idempotent and improving scripts.
f62ca02c-1c47-4d12-900e-902f22777d04.name: 4213 - Automating Data Pipelines - 2020

issuer.summary: issued by GAIn® - The Global AI network

Write automatable code – Change and improve scripts to make them automatable.
Manage quality of automated data pipelines – Define components to monitor data pipeline quality and plan how to act on irregularities.

699ebea2-41ef-48a9-82ff-73c4f85ee478.description: In this two-day course, you will learn to start from a functional design and then build the proof of concept on a real-life case. We will introduce you to the functional design process, learning how to define the requirements, user stories, functionalities, and priorities, so you are equipped to design the right application. Next to that, you will learn and use the fundaments of web design to build and test your proof of concept using front-end frameworks.

issuer.summary: issued by GAIn® - The Global AI network

Enabling speed of delivery - Improving the state of your front-end both visually and functionally by widely used standard libraries such as jQuery and bootstrap.

194af4b9-3a63-4017-b8a7-1e9a78052653.description: The AI Business Expert program brings the depths of analytics and AI to satisfy business objectives. issuer.summary: issued by GAIn® - The Global AI network

Finally, we discuss key questions you should be asking when you receive analytics results and how to recognize analysis pitfalls.

This course covers all the data and technology elements needed to generate impact from AI, along with typical challenges and solutions.

b42d2376-e957-4930-9995-33a5adf05093.description: This module will consist of a 48-hour challenge in which a team of AI practitioners solve a real business case. This includes selecting and deploying the right data technology and translating analytical output to concrete advice. To succeed participants must work together in a collaborative environment, making this both an interactive and fun challenge for all involved.

a454f989-6143-43f5-8bcd-a5ed976fb373.description: Without model implementation in production systems, you will not make any impact on business processes. 0389162c-366d-4be7-ae91-08f7dae68add.description: The 2-star AI & Data for Practitioners program aims to develop starting data and analytics professionals. Find valuable insights from the data – Performing analysis like descriptive analysis, explorative analysis, and regression modeling to answer the business question.

516b6f46-14d2-43b7-af5f-6c0c431c27b0.description: This module will consist of a 48-hour challenge in which a team of AI practitioners solve a real business case. To succeed participants must work together in a collaborative environment, making this both an interactive and fun challenge for all involved.

The course also teaches participants how to interpret the outcomes of the ROI calculation and how to learn from pre and post ROI calculations in order to make better investment decisions.

It’s essential to understand how CLV works, what the challenges in developing a solid CLV calculation are, and how to use CLV to steer on customer value.

The other will help you to identify what a needle is in the first place, using unsupervised anomaly detection methods. Concluding with an analytical task applying these skills to detect anomalies in a real-life case.

430b627d-697e-4e51-97b5-fbca24d4e43e.description: ROI covers all aspects of the calculation of the return of investment. The course also teaches participants how to interpret the outcomes of the ROI calculation and how to learn from pre and post ROI calculations in order to make better investment decisions.

29480154-5428-4b55-871d-f1dcef290767.description: You will be taken on a full learning journey, beginning with the importance and value of causal relationships in business, answering the puzzling ‘what does this mean’ questions. We cover conceptual causal models and get hands-on experience performing estimation with do calculus, one of today’s most exciting and promising ideas in this field.

7f9e0945-65dc-4936-ad1a-fee4e749e5c7.description: This one-day course is a deep-dive into one of the most important metrics in a company that wants to make its most important decisions data driven, customer lifetime value (CLV). It’s essential to understand how CLV works, what the challenges in developing a solid CLV calculation are, and how to use CLV to steer on customer value.

The course also teaches participants how to interpret the outcomes of the ROI calculation and how to learn from pre and post ROI calculations in order to make better investment decisions.

d70cd176-18a8-4b7e-a7e0-dba005bb43fe.description: The 4-star AI & Data Integrator program is aimed at data and analytics professionals. This 3-year program consists of a full-time 6-week bootcamp and 30 follow-up modules. All aimed to grow a data analytics leader and create value with data and analytics in business. The participants are trained on four different domains: Impact & Advisory, Business Domain Knowledge, Data & Technology, and Analytical Methods & Techniques. Also, two 3-month exchange projects are included.
d70cd176-18a8-4b7e-a7e0-dba005bb43fe.name: AI & Data Integration 4-Star Program

issuer.summary: issued by GAIn® - The Global AI network

badge_template_activities.title: Impact & Advisory – Skilled in advisory and communication skills to handle all types of situations, structured opportunity finding, and sizing of the opportunities.
Business Domain Knowledge – Gain knowledge about topics like ROI, CLM, Pricing, and Finance.

Analytical Methods & Techniques – Modeling skills like advanced regression modeling, survival modeling, time series forecasting, structural equation modeling, and understanding the customer by conducting market research.

Data & Technology – Know how to handle large and unstructured data and how to build a big data platform and refine skills in SPSS, SAS, SQL, R and other programming languages depending on the type of software is used in the company.
Exam

ddac00bf-f06b-4d94-8639-8e52bd8b7a11.description: The AI Leadership Program for Women is a training program for ambitious female leaders who want to build and solidify their AI knowledge and leadership skills to add value to the business. It offers a win-win proposition for organizations and female professionals by enabling women to rise to leadership roles using AI as a natural lever and creating positive business impact using AI & Data. This program is a collaboration between GAIn® and The Inclusion Factory.
ddac00bf-f06b-4d94-8639-8e52bd8b7a11.name: AI Leadership Program for Women

issuer.summary: issued by GAIn® - The Global AI network

badge_template_activities.title: The program strengthens women with substantive and strategic data and AI knowledge as a foundation for their leadership.

The program empowers participants to live up to their full potential by creating awareness of gender differences, the rules of the game, and how to leverage their natural strengths with confidence and resilience.
The program creates a positive impact on the business by empowering women to use their (female) qualities constructively and effectively to create impact using AI and data.

The program addresses the unique challenges women encounter when working in a male dominated corporate working environment and creates an environment in which thoughts and experiences can be shared and learned from.

2d4dd99b-eaa2-4cf5-806c-3834368263f0.description: The aim of the D&A Literacy program is to connect different roles, collaborate, and provide the right tools and frameworks to enable you to shape the future. The Front Office Fundamentals track, as part of the Rabobank D&A Literacy Program, is designed for people who input data and communicate analytical outcomes. Their learning goal is to be aware of their importance for D&A and to improve data quality.
